question: Which country played host to the G-20 Foreign Ministers meeting?
explanation:
The “G-20 foreign ministers meeting” was hosted virtually by Saudi Arabia from Riyadh. India’s External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar represented India.
During the meeting, he proposed for the development of voluntary 'G-20 Principles on Coordinated Cross-Border Movement of People'. Discussions during the meeting focused on strengthening international cooperation across borders amidst COVID-19 crisis.
